attributes.documentation:
@notice  Requests a change of the active implementation associated
with this contract.
      * @dev  Anyone can call this function, but confirming the request is authorized
by the custodian.
      * @param  _newDFEngine  The address of the new active implementation.
attributes.name: requestImplChange

attributes.documentation:
@notice  Confirms a pending change of the active implementation
associated with this contract.
      * @dev  the `Converter ConverterImpl` member will be updated
with the requested address.
attributes.name: confirmImplChange

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "AcceptOwnership: only new owner do this."

attributes.value: AcceptOwnership: only new owner do this.

attributes.documentation: [snow] guard is Authority who inherit DSAuth.
attributes.name: setAuthority
